page.title: 08Todwick - Bacon Factory
page.content: At the{factory}on Manor Drive they kill pigs and make{meat products}such as bacon, pork and sausages. There are 190 people who work there. Eighty per cent of the pigs are brought from the port of{Hull}and they kill 1800 - 2000 pigs a week. The pigs are about 20-24 weeks old when they arrive at the factory. The meat is sold to big stores like British Home Stores and Sainsbury's. Most of the workers have to get up very early because work starts at 7.00am.The{working day}lasts until 4.30pm but the managers work until about 6.30pm. The company started in 1969 but some buildings were built many years before, when there was a farm on the site.
